document.discussion_title: Summer Bandshell Concert Series Has Concluded
document.topic_text: Summer Bandshell Concert Series Has Concluded August 11th, 2016 Contributed Article Jamestown P arks, Recreation & Conservation Department The Jamestown Parks, Recreation & Conservation Department has announced that the 2016 Summer Bandshell Concert series has concluded for the season. The August 10 th concert featuring the Jamestown Municipal Band that was cancelled due to severe weather conditions will not be rescheduled at this time. The Department thanks all the sponsors, musicians, and many volunteers for an otherwise successful concert season. In addition to funding provided annually by the City of Jamestown, the summer bandshell concerts were made available free to the public through the support of the following: Allen Park Women’s Club, Cattaraugus County Arts Council Decentralization Program, Chautauqua Region Community Foundation, Fessenden, Laumer & DeAngelo; Lind Funeral Home, Local 134, American Federation of Musicians; Scandinavian Studies Program, Salon 1, 7-Eleven, The Resource Center, The United Arts Appeal of Chautauqua County Projects Pool Grant Program, and WCA Hospital. Next article
